---
name: Bug report without crash
about: Report a non-crashing bug
title: Bug
labels: bug
assignees: ''

---

**Version**
The mod version number you're using, like e.g. `1.21.1-1.0.0`

**What you expected**
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

**What actually happened**
A clear and concise description of what actually happened. Please include any details you can think of.

**Steps to reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Place the block
2. Right click
3. See the error

(If you don't know the steps, you can skip this section! Also consider sending a screenshot of your setup)
